Lasitha Ranatunga wrote:

> I've been solving this kind of duplication by creating my own assertions.
> As an example, see my version of CalculateAgeTest below.  I'm curious about
> the pros/cons of each approach?

You're adding a new test method for each test. I'm just adding data. I 
could externalize the test data to a file and add tests without writing 
code. That's the big difference.
